data.title: About The Team At Direct Energy Controls
data.meta_description: Direct Energy Controls is a team of licensed, experienced electrical contractors that provide installation, integration and repairs to electric systems.
data.text:
We are a team of experienced, licensed, professional, certified electrical contractors and controls technicians working together to provide automation and monitoring products and services. Currently, we have more than 15 years experience with installations, integration, and repairs . We provide electrical systems and services to companies, government spaces and industry.

Direct Energy Controls' business is focused on projects that are of medium to large scale. Unlike many other contractors, our business focus and expertise is primarily on automation, monitoring and temperature controls at large facilities and institutions. By maintaining this focus, Direct Energy Controls vision is to become the most relied upon Controls Installation and Repair company in the region

We have earned a great reputation with clients as well as competing electrical contractors by providing strong support, excellent customer service, honest business practices and competitive prices.

We have achieved this great reputation by recruiting the best technicians in the area, and then continually reviewing our business and improving on it. Moreover, we will continue to improve by listening to our customersâ concerns and responding quickly to their electrical contractor needs.
